mapper.insert: insert into cart (mem_num, stk_num, cart_quantity) values(#{mem_num}, #{stk_num}, #{cart_quantity})
mapper.select: select * from cart as c, product_stock as ps, product as pd where c.stk_num = ps.stk_num and ps.pd_num = pd.pd_num and mem_num = #{mem_num}
mapper.update: update cart set cart_quantity where mem_num = #{mem_num}
mapper.delete: delete from cart where mem_num = #{mem_num} and pd_num = #{pd_num} and stk_option = #{stk_option}
